name: Helen of Troy Limited
description: Helen of Troy Limited is a global consumer products company focused on health and wellness, beauty, and home consumer products. Founded in 1968 and headquartered in El Paso, Texas, the company operates through multiple well-known brands, including OXO, Hydro Flask, Braun, and Revlon. Helen of Troy is recognized for its commitment to innovation and quality, offering a diverse range of products from personal care devices to kitchen tools and accessories. The company has a strong track record in the design and development of innovative products that enhance everyday life, ensuring that its offerings meet the evolving needs of consumers. In recent years, Helen of Troy has expanded its portfolio through strategic acquisitions, allowing it to enhance its market position in the beauty and wellness sectors. With a focus on sustainability, Helen of Troy is also committed to reducing its environmental impact through responsible sourcing and operations. The company’s mission is to deliver innovative solutions that improve the lives of its consumers while maintaining high standards of corporate responsibility and ethical practices.
